cause.description:
Our purpose is to support the Somalia community in Minnesota through education, health and employment. We provide services needed within the community through translation, resources, transportation, and more. We also work to support efforts in Somalia toward education, health and employment. Visit www.ussfs.org.
1. SFS was established in 2003 to serve Somali immigrants, their families and descants in Minnesota and to improve the overall quality of of life for Somali populations.
2. SFS also exists to serve as a bridge for continuing the positive relationship between Somalia and the United States through local communities, school partners organizations.
cause.mission: Our mission is to promote and support Somali families and individuals through access to resources and opportunities.
cause.name: Somali Family Services
